level.text: A licensee may challenge the issuance of a citation issued by an ABRA Investigator or MPD Officer by requesting in writing a show cause hearing before the Board. The written request for a show cause hearing must be received by ABRA within thirty (30) days from the date that the citation was issued to the establishment.
